abstracts.cdata!:
The major changes to the Meeting Teacher
            Needs for Education for All Project and rationale are: (a) a
            reduction in the targets for two outcome indicators and one
            intermediate outcome indicator, in light of delays in
            project implementation due to capacity constraints
            exacerbated by the January 2010 earthquake, and (b)
            strengthening of the capacity of the implementing agency,
            the National Ministry of Education and Professional Training
            (MENFP), and of the Teacher Preparation Institutes (IFMs) in
            order to help ensure that the revised targets can be met;
            and (c) a reallocation of the grant proceeds due to changes
            in component project costs.
